src:
Menhub Ajak Masyarakat Vote Soetta Jadi Bandara Terbaik Dunia
02 Nov 2019, 07:09 by Sylke Febrina Laucereno


Foto: Menhub Budi Karya Sumadi (Andhika Prasetia/detikcom).

Jakarta - Bandara Soekarno-Hatta (Soetta) masuk dalam jajaran bandara terbaik di dunia oleh Skytrax. Dalam Skytrax World Airport Awards 2019, Bandara Internasional Soekarno-Hatta berhasil naik peringkat ke posisi 40 atau menjadi Top 40 World's Best Airport in The World.Menteri Perhubungan Budi Karya Sumadi mengajak masyarakat khususnya para pengguna jasa bandara untuk memberikan suaranya melalui vote Sky Trax World Airport Award 2020."Saya Budi Karya Sumadi Menteri Perhubungan RI, mengajak seluruh pengguna jasa bandara untuk mendukung Bandara Internasional Soekarno-Hatta menjadi bandara terbaik di dunia," kata Budi dalam siaran pers, Sabtu (2/11/2019).Budi mengajak segenap masyarakat Indonesia untuk melakukan voting online di Sky Trax. "Dengan vote melalui voting online Sky Trax," ujar mantan Dirut PT Angkasa Pura II itu.Dia menambahkan dengan voting ini maka Bandara Internasional Soekarno-Hatta menjadi pintu gerbang Indonesia dimata dunia internasional, dan semakin baik dalam hal pelayanan dan fasilitasnya.Sebelumnya Bandara Internasional Soekarno-Hatta kembali masuk jajaran bandara terbaik di dunia oleh Skytrax. Dalam Skytrax World Airport Awards 2019, Bandara Internasional Soekarno-Hatta berhasil naik peringkat ke posisi 40 atau menjadi Top 40 World's Best Airport in The World.Dilihat dari levelnya, grade Bandara Soetta tahun ini lebih tinggi dibandingkan pada 2018 yang berada di peringkat 45 terbaik dunia dan peringkat 44 terbaik dunia di 2017 serta peringkat ke-63 terbaik dunia di 2016.Simak Video "Menhub Ajak Vote Soekarno-Hatta Jadi Bandara Terbaik di Dunia"[Gambas:Video 20detik](kil/hns)
text:
Minister of Transportation Invites Soetta Vote Community to Become the World's Best Airport
02 Nov 2019, 07:09 by Sylke Febrina Laucereno


Photo: Minister of Transportation Budi Karya Sumadi (Andhika Prasetia / detikcom).

Jakarta - Soekarno-Hatta Airport (Soetta) is included in the ranks of the best airports in the world by Skytrax. In the 2019 Skytrax World Airport Awards, Soekarno-Hatta International Airport succeeded in moving up to 40th position or becoming the Top 40 World's Best Airport in The World. Transportation Minister Budi Karya Sumadi invited the public, especially airport service users, to vote through the votes of the Sky Trax World Airport Award 2020. "I am Budi Karya Sumadi, Minister of Transportation of the Republic of Indonesia, inviting all airport service users to support Soekarno-Hatta International Airport to be the best airport in the world," Budi said in a press release on Saturday (11/02/2019). Budi invited all people Indonesia to vote online on Sky Trax. "By voting through Sky Trax's online voting," said the former Managing Director of PT Angkasa Pura II. He added that with this vote the Soekarno-Hatta International Airport became the gateway to Indonesia in the eyes of the international world, and improved in terms of services and facilities. Previously the International Airport Soekarno-Hatta re-entered the ranks of the best airports in the world by Skytrax. In the 2019 Skytrax World Airport Awards, Soekarno-Hatta International Airport managed to move up to 40th position or become the Top 40 World's Best Airport in the World. Judging from its level, Soetta Airport's grade was higher this year compared to 2018 which was ranked 45th in the world's best. and ranked 44 of the world's best in 2017 and ranked 63rd of the world's best in 2016. Watch Video "The Minister of Transportation Invites Soekarno-Hatta Vote to Become the Best Airport in the World" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (kil / hns)
